Translations.Text: avanu gupta mattu vyaktavada ellavannu aritiruva prabalanu yuktivantanu agiddane

pravadi varyare, (visvasigalodane heliri;) nivu mahileyarige (patniyarige) talak niduvaga (vicchedisuvaga) avara (nairmalyada) avadhiyalli talak nidiri mattu avadhiya dinagalannu sariyagi enisiri. Mattu nim'modeyanada allahanige anjiri. Avaru spastavada aslila krtyavannu esagiradiddare, avarannu (iddat‌na avadhiyalli) avara manegalinda hora haka bedi, mattu svatah avaru hora hogadirali. Ivu allahanu niscayisiruva mitigalu. Allahanu niscayisiruva mitigalannu ullanghisidavanu svatah tanna mele akramavesagi kondanu. Nimage tiliyadu, istada balika allahanu hosa margavannenadaru torisalu bahudu

munde avaru tam'ma avadhiya koneyannu muttidaga avarannu niyamanusara (patniyaragi) ittukolliri athava niyamanusara avarannu pratyekisiri hagu nim'ma paiki ibbaru n'yayavantarannu saksiyagisikolliri. Mattu nivu, allahanigagi saksi heliri. Ivu, allahanalli mattu paralokadalli nambike ullavanige nidalaguttiruva upadesagalu. Allahana bhaya ullavanige avanu (allahanu, sankatagalinda) hora baruva dari toruvanu

mattu avanu uhisiyu illada kadeyinda avanige sadhanagalannu odagisuvanu. Allahanalli bharavase ittavanige avane (allahane) saku. Allahanu tanna karyavannu purtigolisiye tiruvanu. (Adare) allahanu pratiyondakku ondu nirdista pramanavannu niscayisiruvanu

Nim'ma (vicchedita) mahileyara paiki rtu sravada kuritu nirasaragiruvavara (rtusrava nintavara) avadhiya visayadalli nimage sansayaviddare, avara avadhi muru tingalagide. Innu rtusrava arambhavagilladavarigu idu anvayisuttade. Garbhiniyara avadhiyu prasavadavaregiruttade. Allahanu, tannannu anjuvavanige avana vyavaharagalannu sulabhagolisi koduttane
ivu nim'medege ilisi kodalagiruva allahana adesagalu. Allahanu tannannu anjuvavana papagalannella nivarisuvanu mattu avanige bhavya pratiphalavannu niduvanu

(iddat‌na avadhiyalli) sadhyavadastu mattige a mahileyarannu nivu vasisuvalle vasagolisiri mattu avara badukannu dustaragolisalikkagi avarige kirukula nidabedi. Ondu vele avaru garbhiniyaragiddare avaru prasavisuva tanaka avara kharcu veccagalannu bharisiri. Avaru nimagagi (maguvige) molehalunisidare – avarige avara sambhavaneyannu nidiri. Nivu (ella visayagalannu) niyamanusara paraspara samalocisi nirdharisiri. Innu, nimage kastavenisidare, adakke (maguvige) berobbalu mole halunisali
